Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.services.media.collections

Class CollectionService

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.services.media.collections.CollectionService
@Service
public class CollectionService
extends java.lang.Object
Collection Service

This Service is used to provide methods to the CollectionController

Author:
Christoph Frischmuth, John Klippstein, Mickey Knop, Robin Beck

  • Method Details

    • addReferencesToCollection

      public Collection addReferencesToCollection​(Collection collection, java.lang.Long userMappingId) throws UserNotFoundException
      Adds a reference to the user that should be marked as creator to the collection
      Parameters:
      collection - The collection that should be modified
      userMappingId - The id of the user that should be added to the colelction
      Returns:
      the modified collection with the valid user reference
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user has not been found

    • convertToDto

      public CollectionDto convertToDto​(Collection collection)
      Converts a single collection entity to a collection DTO
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection that should be converted
      Returns:
      the converted collection

    • convertToReducedDto

      public ReducedCollectionDto convertToReducedDto​(Collection collection)
      Converts a single collection to a reduced collection DTO
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection that should be converted
      Returns:
      the converted collection

    • removeCollectionsWithMediaId

      public java.util.List<Collection> removeCollectionsWithMediaId​(java.util.List<Collection> collections, java.lang.Long mediumId)
      Removes all collections from a given list that include a certain medium
      Parameters:
      collections - the list of collections that should be checked
      mediumId - the id of the medium which should be searched
      Returns:
      the filtered collection list
